action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant in the freezer, the plate on the table and the mop in the refrigerator.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.
You take the pillow. In your inventory you have a pillow.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a pillow and a potted plant.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You put the pillow on the counter.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a plate.
You are in a living room now. There are a book, a side table, a couch, a chair, a table and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
You put the plate on the table.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a mop.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a bedroom, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a pillow. The cupboard is open. The pillow is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
You put the potted plant in the freezer.

> go to kitchen
> go to hallway
> go to broom closet
> drop mop
> go to hallway
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> open refrigerator
> put mop in refrigerator
> done
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a pillow. The cupboard is open. The pillow is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry, a living room and a hallway here.

>
